titleStmt.title: An anti-christian conspiracy detected, and Satan's champion defeated being a reply to an envious & scurrilous libel without any name to it, called, Work for a cooper : being also a vindication of my book, entituled, The antiquity of the Quakers ... / by me Thomas Wynne.
titleStmt.author: Wynne, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
